thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TICC Capital Adopts Stock Repurchase Program

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TICC Capital Adopts Stock Repurchase Program

organizations.name: brief-ticc capital adopts stock repurchase program feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - TICC Capital Corp:
* TICC CAPITAL CORP. ADOPTS STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM * TICC CAPITAL CORP - ‍HAS AUTHORIZED A PROGRAM FOR PURPOSE OF REPURCHASING UP TO $25 MILLION WORTH OF ITS COMMON STOCK​
* TICC CAPITAL-‍EXPECTS REPURCHASE PROGRAM TO BE IN PLACE UNTIL EARLIER OF DEC 31, 2018 OR UNTIL $25 MILLION OF CO‘S OUTSTANDING SHARES HAVE BEEN REPURCHASED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
